Comments.?mCreatePiyori@mHRChara@@UAE_NXZ: Creates a stun star effect above the character's head.
Comments.?mStartChangeWeapon@mHRPc@@QAEXXZ: Makes Travis put away his weapon... and then immediately pull it out again.

Comments.class HrMessage: Related to the top banner UI messages.
Comments.struct stCharaStatus: Contains position, rotation, hp, flags, etc

Structure: Vec(float inX, float inY, float inZ) { x = inX; y = inY; z = inZ; }
GXColor(int R, int G, int B) { PackedValue = (255<<24) + (int(R)<<16) + (int(G)<<8) + int(B); }
